Important Articles.headline: Semiconductors are the core infrastructure powering the Information Age. Still, they’re subject to swings in the broader economy because customers often stockpile chips ahead of demand, and investors seem to believe that inventory levels are correcting - over the past six months, the industry has shed 21.3%. This drawdown was significantly worse than the S&P 500’s 4% fall.
